text: Lacy Herman Thornburg (born December 20, 1929) is an American lawyer and retired United States district judge of the United States District Court for the Western District of North Carolina. He was the North Carolina attorney general from 1985 to 1993. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:Living people Category:North Carolina attorneys general Category:American judges Category:Politicians from Charlotte, North Carolina Category:Lawyers from Charlotte, North Carolina Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Lacy Thornburg
